full_summary:
### Procurement Notice Stop Procurement Notice Stop

#### Solicitation Reference cb-890-37853302 Solicitation Reference cb-890-37853302

The Department of Fisheries and Oceans invites qualified contractors to submit a Proposal for the provision of marine construction services for the removal of dredge spoil from a containment cell at the public wharf in Cap-des-Caissie, Kent County, New Brunswick.

#### Project Overview

This Contract requires all necessary labor, products, materials, and services to execute the work as described in the Contractual Documents.

#### Scope of Work

The work scope includes, but is not limited to:

1. Excavation of the existing dredging material in the containment cell
2. Haulage of the excavated material to a designated disposal site
3. Manipulation of the material at the disposal site
4. Restoration of the site and access to the site
5. Cleaning of the site access path and surrounding road

#### Method of Procurement

This Procurement is conducted using a Competitive – Open bidding process. The lowest Price will be the selection criterion used to determine the successful Bidder.

#### Important Dates

* Tender Closing Date: 2024-12-04 14:00:00
* Contact Information
* Dina Al-Eryani, Contract Specialist
* dina.al-eryani@dfo-mpo.gc.ca
* 506-282-2340

#### Appendices

Please refer to the tender notice document for attachments (e.g. contract plans and specifications) at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/52002/annex-c-empty-containement-cell-cap-des-caissie-plans-specs-%28eng.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/52002/annex-c-empty-containement-cell-cap-des-caissie-plans-specs-%28eng.pdf)

This notice is subject to the provisions of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and is open to all qualified contractors. Potential bidders are invited to contact the Department of Fisheries and Oceans for further information.
